title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in the defect 1GEWMOZ, where ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file 'test.xml'
3. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content
4. Select 'test.xml' in Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'

After step 5, nothing happens; it simply reactivates the scripted resource editor example. This means selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' does not have any effect when the file is already open in a different type of editor. 
Searching for an existing open file should also consider the type of editor.

Moreover, it should open a new editor on the file because the selected editor type is different.
